summary: ALL INSTRUMENT PANEL GAUGES SWEEP BACK AND FORTH CONSTANTLY. THEREFORE, THE SPEEDOMETER READING IS IMPOSSIBLE AS WELL AS THE FUEL GAUGE, TEMPERATURE GAUGE, OIL GAUGE, FRONT AND BACK AIR PSI GAUGES, RPMS, ETC. ALL GAUGES BEGIN TO WAG AS SOON AS THE MOTOR IS STARTED AND CONTINUE THE WHOLE TIME THE VEHICLE IS IN MOTION ON THE HIGHWAY.
